sub_title: PR and Communications Manager at Recruitee — the #1 collaborative hiring software.
summary:
I’m a gladiator in a pencil skirt aka an influencer marketing and award-winning PR consultant.

Both my education and experience is steeped in communications with a BCom: Communication Management degree and vast experience in traditional and digital PR with some of South Africa's biggest PR agencies. This afforded me to work on some of the biggest brands like PPC, LG Mobile, P&G, Unilever, MTN, Nespresso and many others and some fantastic smaller brands. 

I've been privileged to work with some of the best minds in PR and been part of teams that won PRISM awards as well as a couple of the highly prestigious and coveted SABRE awards (aka the Oscars of PR). 

My opinions on brands with regards to PR and influencer marketing have been published in the likes of The Media Online, Modern Marketing, Biz Community, Media Update, Evolve (a UK business website) and Journal of Strategic Marketing. I was featured on the cover of the latter publication in 2019. 

My writing isn't only industry specific, I also write articles on lifestyle, tech, culture and travel. My work has been featured in Joburg Style, HuffPost (where I was a contributor until it closed down in South Africa) and Future Now to name a few. As part of my profession I also write content like press releases, blog posts and web copy in addition to editing and proof reading. 

I have been a speaker at the Social Media Conference as well as the Modern Marketing Trend Camp as an expert on influencer marketing to talk about the importance of influencers as a marketing channel for brands. 

I have been a guest on Cape Talk radio, PowerFM, Maggs on Media and The Fix on eNCA to discuss the above topics and been quoted in various articles by reputable journalists.

awards.title: Certificate of Excellence: The Pets News Network (PNN)' for Marltons
awards.description: I had the privilege of being part of the team that conceptualised and brought the first Pets News Network in South Africa to life. The characters report on the news from a pet's perspective every month.

awards.description: I was privileged to be part of the PR team for this campaign. My key role was managing the social media channels during the crisis, ensuring the public was informed and containing the conversation.

awards.title: Gold Sabre Award for Consumer Electronics
awards.description:
The Ogilvy PR team in Johannesburg who managed the LG Mobile account won a Gold Sabre Award in the category Consumer electronics, for LG Electronics Building in brand reputation in a competitive market through innovation and effective engagement. 

When Brand Africa and TNS named LG and as one of the top 10 brands in Africa in January 2015; they knew that their efforts to build trust, brand recognition and reputation through a powerful and integrated PR and social campaign, had taken root. 

The Sabre Awards is international and the Ogilvy PR team managed to come out victorious over thousands of international entries.

awards.title: Silver PRISM award for Campaign of the Year for LG Mobile
awards.description:
The Ogilvy PR team in Johannesburg who managed the LG Mobile account won Silver in Campaign of the Year category, for LG Electronics Building in brand reputation in a competitive market through innovation and effective engagement. 

When Brand Africa and TNS named LG and as one of the top 10 brands in Africa in January 2015; they knew that their efforts to build trust, brand recognition and reputation through a powerful and integrated PR and social campaign, had taken root.

profile_positions.description:
I manage the PR and communications for Recruitee
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
• Developing strategies for focus regions
• Develop messaging frameworks
• Create and develop PR content like press releases, blog posts, tthought leader pieces; and customer 
   success stories
• Proof reading and editing 
• Identify and implement region-specific advertorial and sponsorship opportunities with relevant media 
  to achieve PR objectives
• Manage regional PR agencies
• Manage internal stakeholders and spokespeople; includes prepping for media opportunities
• Assist with ideation of ideas for social media and broader campaign content 
• Assist with script writing for videos
profile_positions.title: PR and Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a freelance Public Relations and influencer marketing consultant I have the privilege of working with some of the greatest minds in the industry to service a variety of clients across industries.

Roles included:

Head of department and lead influencer marketing strategist
Duties:
•	Developing influencer marketing strategies for brands.
•	Working side by side with brand managers and agencies implementing influencer campaigns. 
•	Educating marketers on the influencer marketing industry and landscape.
Marketing duties:
•	Podcast producer, editor and host. 
•	Social media planning and content development for internal brands.
•	Newsletter development and distribution.

PR Account Director
Duties:
•	PR account lead on various clients.
•	PR plan development.
•	Project management.
•	Content management for digital assets. 
•	Content writing, editing and proof reading. 
•	Client relations. 
•	Media relations.
•	Influencer strategy and management. 

PR Consultant
Duties:
•	PR lead on a leading coffee brand. 
•	Media relations. 
•	Project management. 
•	Reporting.

Achievements

Certificate of Excellence: The Pets News Network (PNN)' for Marltons: EMEA SABRE Awards 2022

Platinum SABRE Award for Best in Show: 'Reputation in the can' for Tiger Brands Limited: The International Africa Sabre Awards · May 2022

Superior Achievement in Reputation Management (Grand Prix): 'Reputation in the can' for Tiger Brands Limited: Africa SABRE Awards 2022

Superior Achievement in Reputation Management: 'Reputation in the can' for Tiger Brands Limited: EMEA SABRE Awards 2022

Reputation in the can: One of the top 15 campaigns globally in 2022 according to PRovoke Media

profile_positions.description: In 2017 I took the leap and joined a PR start-up. The experience was great and I learnt a great deal too. Unfortunately, some of us were retrenched a year in due to unforeseen circumstances. I will forever be grateful for taking the leap, however.
